note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices.
title: Share of cereals allocated to human food vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: The share of domestic cereal supply that is allocated to direct human food rather than animal feed or biofuels. GDP is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living across countries.
sourceDesc: Our World in Data based on Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations, Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
